attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The United Kingdom has a large Hindu, Sikh, Jain population.

We are the second largest group/sect that develops the British Economy.

In India we offer respect to other religions and give holidays for Christmas, Easter, and Eid etc.

Diwali is our New Year; we should have the right to celebrate our New Year just as the 'Anglican' does.

We request the British Government to show the respect it has for our religions and declare Diwali a 'Public Holiday'

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Declare Diwali a Public Holiday."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16507
